description: A flush fitting magazine for use with pistols and submachine guns.  Holds 15 rounds of standard pistol ammo.
A long stick magazine for use with pistols and submachine guns.  Holds 30 rounds of standard pistol ammo.
A 'speedloader', a metal block capable of holding and releasing ammunition to aid in loading revolvers.  Accepts 6 standard or magnum pistol cartridges.
